Hi! This video focuses on the /ɑ/ sound.
A challenge with the /ɑ/ sound is that the speaker might not open the mouth enough...
...so a word like "Hop" closes off to sound like "Hope".
Let's try comparing some /ɑ/ and /oʊ/ words.
He has a clock in his cloak.
Keep your practice up on EnglishCentral and good luck.
